MRS. MADGE LAW

Mr. William G. Harley
Radio Hall
University of Wisconsin
Madison 6, Wisconsin
November 3, 1959
Dear Bill:
My congratulations on chairing the finest convention we have
had. I know that victories are a matter of routine with you, but
I am very proud of the leadership you have given our association
and the success that it has had because of the same. I salute
you!
With warmest personal regards, I am
Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
